faq.question1: How long does it take to learn English from scratch?
faq.answer1: It depends on the student's level, the time they dedicate to learning, and their individual ability. Typically, with consistent practice, noticeable progress can be achieved in 6–12 months.
faq.question2: What is the format of the lessons?
faq.answer2: Courses are available in both offline and online formats. Lessons include speaking, writing, listening comprehension, and grammar practice.
faq.question3: Who teaches at the learning center?
faq.answer3: Teachers are experienced and certified professionals. In addition to IELTS certificates, they also have international TESOL/TEFL certifications.
faq.question4: How can I register for the courses?
faq.answer4: You can enroll by visiting the center in person or by filling out an online application form.
faq.question5: How many students are in each group?
faq.answer5: Groups usually consist of 6–12 students. Individual lessons are also available.
faq.question6: Can I start from a beginner level?
faq.answer6: Yes, our courses are tailored for all levels, and you can start from the beginner level.
faq.question7: From what age can one join the courses?
faq.answer7: Students can start from age 7, and there is no upper age limit.
